Rule

Rule (Large)

Canon
CSS Unverified

Large

Page or Section Titles.

Rule (Medium)

Canon
CSS Unverified

Medium

Divide subsections, or divide different groups of elements (between panels, rails, etc.)

Show Markup

Rule (Small)

Canon
CSS Unverified

Small

Show Markup
